Package view.entities

Class EntityView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.entities.EntityView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CursorView, DrawnLineView, InkJarView, PortalView, StickmanView
    public abstract class EntityView
extends java.lang.Object
    A abstract view capable of holding a sprite with a certain position and rotation. This view is able to update its data based on a entity model.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods

      abstract com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite createSprite()
      Abstract method that creates the view sprite.

      Draws the sprite from this view using a sprite batch.

      Updates this view based on a certain model.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draws the sprite from this view using a sprite batch.
        Parameters:
        batch - The sprite batch to be used for drawing.

      • createSprite

        public abstract com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite createSprite()
        Abstract method that creates the view sprite. Concrete implementation should extend this method to create their own sprites.
        Returns:
        the sprite representing this view.

      • update

        public void update​(EntityModel model)
        Updates this view based on a certain model.
        Parameters:
        model - the model used to update this view
